spells.name: Ant Haul
spells.description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

spells.name: Break
spells.description: Gives an object the broken condition.

spells.name: Crafter's Curse
spells.description: Subject takes -5 on Craft skill checks.

spells.name: Crafter's Fortune
spells.description: Subject gains +5 on next Craft check.

spells.name: Dancing Lantern
spells.description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

spells.name: Flare Burst
spells.description: As flare, but affects all creatures in 10 ft.

spells.name: Gravity Bow
spells.description: Arrows do damage as though one size category bigger.

spells.name: Hydraulic Push
spells.description: Wave of water bull rushes an enemy.

spells.name: Memory Lapse
spells.description: Subject forgets events back to last turn.

spells.name: Sculpt Corpse
spells.description: Makes corpse look like another creature.

spells.name: Touch of Gracelessness
spells.description: Subject loses 1d6 + 1 Dex/two levels and is prone to falling down.
